description:
&
A sleek organization tool designed specifically for the A.D.H.D'ers of the world! 

With this tool, tasks are managed from cradle to grave...DRIVEN TO COMPLETION! 

Simply enter your "Action Items" with a priority, status, primary stakeholder, and the next action step or notes needed to complete the task, and this app will organize, sort, and color code the items in order of importance. 

You can call or email the primary stakeholder directly from the app - emails are pre-formatted for you! (paid version only)

Change the owner, status, and priority as the life-cycle of the items evolve - the app will manage re-prioritizing and sorting the item for you!

Feedback welcomed either through the app catalog or email me directly.
jimzone11@yahoo.com
Enjoy!
